description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. So, you think you know everything about zombies? Well, you haven't seen 'Zombie Sausages', did you? There is nowhere you can hide, these sausages are trying to take over the world. Only you can save the world from this horror! You have to act fast and shoot them all....
description.short: So, you think you know everything about zombies? Well, you haven't seen 'Zombie Sausages', did you? There is nowhere you can hide, these sausages are trying to take over the world. Only you can save the world from this horror! You have to act fast and shoot them all....
